phrases: You are not hurt, are you?
Did you come to see me
Do you know how worried we were after you went missing?
You sent out a distress signal, did not you?
Then why was the signal lost from the unmanned pod...
I thought Senpai... I mean, Ichika-san, was in danger...
I will introduce him to you.
Not only are you interacting with the locals,
but now you have got a boyfriend?!
You know what it says, right?
You are interacting with Kaito-kun, too...
I came here to save you!
Do you realize how worried your family has been?!
You do not get what is going on, do you?!
I was thinking too much about how the story should continue.
I wonder if they got the time wrong.
Tanigawa-san, sorry to ask, but could you go take a look?
I will introduce myself properly this time.
I am Emika Takatsuki, Ichika's older sister.
Thank you for taking Ichika in after she would been in an accident.
I thank you on behalf of our family.
I am sorry for all the trouble.
I will be taking Ichika back myself.
A distress call was received from a remote planet...
And contact was lost with the unmanned pod that went to save you.
Ichika, they have not just declared you a crash victim, they have labeled you missing.
Do you know how worried we were when we heard that?
All our relatives are talking about it.
So I took a paid vacation,
and came out here to do my best to find you.
I was so worried, and you are just living here without a care in the world,
and you even have a boyfriend.
I did not think people would make such a big deal about it...
I think I might like the sound of that.
It is not bad to have a younger guy call you that once in a while.
Now that you know Ichika-san is safe,
there should not be a problem anymore, right?
They have already formed a search party.
But if you report back that I am safe...
You were designated missing on a planet
that is a grade F on the industrial scale,
where interaction with the locals is forbidden.
From the Federation's point of view,
I am sure they would want to verify the situation as quickly as possible.
If they found you and found out what you have been doing,
you would be arrested and taken into custody on the spot.
You would be prosecuted in accordance with Federation law.
Is there anything we can do to stop that?
That is why I am here.
Ichika, you will be coming back with me before things get out of hand.
I am not going to leave Kaito-kun.
If you stay here, you will because problems for Kirishima-kun and the rest of the planet.
I have not done anything wrong.
That is not the problem here.
Let us listen to what your sister has to say,
and then we will figure out what
Ichika, you already understand the situation, right?
You had to see something that was not exactly pleasant.
We are supposed to be filming... already...
Why are not you wearing any shoes?
Could she go back home and then come back here again?
Given the situation, I imagine that would be difficult.
Then could you take me into space with you?!
My sister's not very elegant and she is stubborn.
Let us... get a change of scenery, shall we?
They are already looking for me.
And I could not get away from them if I tried.
I do not think they would listen to what I had to say, either.
So you cannot do anything about it?
And if I try to stay here, things are going to get really bad.
So you are just going to leave?
You are going to leave Kaito-kun behind and go back to space?
But I cannot do anything about
So you are going to give up on being with the guy you like?!
So you dated Kaito-kun knowing that you would just give up,
knowing that your feelings for him were not really that strong.
Do you know how I have felt?
Just give up already, leave him, and go back to space or whatever!
There is so much nature left.
My planet does not look a thing like it,
but it still feels like I have been here before.
She said that there is an image of a place in her head,
and it is somewhere on this planet.
That is why she came to this planet.
That image is inside me, too.
And now we have inherited that.
Maybe that is where they buried a bunch of treasure or something?
I did not really care that much about it,
but it may have been on Ichika's mind this whole time.
When I looked for Ichika, I scanned this whole planet,
but there was no place here like the one I have in my head.
I know you said you want to go into space with us,
but there is no way I can take someone from a...
This planet would first have to develop the technology for interstellar flight,
make contact with us, join the Galactic Federation,
and then what you want could happen.
For that to happen, this planet would probably require...
Unless Federation law was amended somehow, it is just not possible.
You care about Ichika so much.
I am going to take Ichika back home.
It is for her own good.
I never thought she would get a boyfriend.
I only came here to get her.
I never thought I would have to do this instead.
You are Ichika Takatsuki-san's sister, correct?
Kanna has not come back yet.
And what are Kai and Ichika-senpai doing?
I hope he is not fooling around while we are supposed to be filming.
Might be kind of lucky for me, though.
Takatsuki-senpai said she is going back to space.
Someone is come to take her back.
She said some stuff's going on.
So we are not making the movie anymore.
There is no point in being here any longer, so let us go home!
Does Takatsuki-senpai really want to go back to space?
She is going to go and leave Kai behind.
Are you okay with all of this?
Are you really okay with all of this?!
I was talking to your sister until just a little while ago.
I asked her to take me into space with you, but she said no.
I am not going to give up...
on finding a way to stay with you.
Senpai, are not you giving up a little too quickly?
We heard what was going on, so we came here.
We could not just let you go like that.
I-It would be a problem for us.
I mean, if you left, we would not be able to film the movie anymore.
I want you to stay here.
I do not want to go...
I do not want to return home...
I do not want to leave him...
I want to stay with you!
I do not care if all of outer space is against me!
Then that is what you should do!
So what are you going to do?
Are you going to hide somewhere?
Seems like you have a problem on your hands.
I have some good news for you.
Senpai can stay here on Earth?!
There is a low probability this will actually work, however.
What do we have to do?
Ichika, you were searching for the image you had in your head, right?
Then that means there is a possibility...
B-But that is just something I saw in my head...
Senpai's sister said that she also has an identical image in her head,
but she also said there was not any place like that on Earth.
Leaving behind an image like that is a rather complex piece of work.
They may have used some method to make it impossible to find...
Then how can we find it?
We can try comparing the data you have gathered...
If there is a place on the map that is not in her data,
Remon, how did you figure that out?
I was being so selfish, but you still...
If we can find that location,
and find something that proves Earthlings and aliens have come in contact before...
Then Earth will lose its status as an F on the industrial scale.
If we can find that before the search party arrives...
Senpai, we only have to look at areas in Japan, right?
Yeah, judging by the plants and surroundings in the image I have,
I think we can limit our search to just Shinshu.
We are going to find it!
Something is coming... from the right...
You should sleep a little bit, too, Kai.
But we do not know when they will come for Senpai.
Then I will tell you something to help you stay awake.
I told Kanna I liked her the other day.
I knew how she would respond, though.
That is why you told me about Tanigawa...
I was thinking too much about myself.
So I do not want you to end up the same way.
Also, Mio told me she liked me when we went to Okinawa.
After I got into high school, I had not really been doing anything,
so I was thinking I wanted to at least do something,
and I guess a lot of things happened, after all.
Yeah, especially after Senpai came, right?
Yeah, I mean, we are talking about...
I cannot really do anything else,
but I hope you find it, Ichika.
The place you are looking for,
You can sleep a little bit longer.
You want to sleep in my lap?
Why are you guys acting so lovey-dovey?
This place has not been checked!
The search party is close to the planet.
Rinon, hurry up and jump us to that location!
It will take three hours to get there by train.
There is someone coming after her, right?
so I am glad I got a car ready.
Who is going to be coming after you?
I wonder what else she has...
Probably another rescue pod like before.
Ichika, they are going to come after you by scanning for your biological data, right?
Yeah, but why do you know that?
It will reduce the biological responses you are giving off.
they will transmit biological data identical to Ichika's.
Did you also get those from...?
All right, let us keep heading towards
You want to go see a movie sometime?
We have a little bit more than ten kilometers to go.
I am not doing this for you.
I am doing it for the person I like!
I want the person I like to keep smiling.
I am going to make you regret this three years from now!
It does not look like anything else is coming.
What are we going to do?
The heroine evades her pursuers' attacks and heads toward her destination.
Seems like we will be able to film a pretty nice climax.
And we will leave the epilogue up to God.
That is the best part of making a movie.
Wh-What is up with this car?!
Episode 12 Waiting there, in the summer.
No matter how much time passes...
